thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 tipped to sport 2K sAMOLED display, 12MP Dual Pixel camera and Iris scanner
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8 tipped to sport 2K sAMOLED display, 12MP Dual Pixel camera and Iris scanner

title: Samsung Galaxy S8 tipped to sport 2K sAMOLED display, 12MP Dual Pixel camera and Iris scanner
text:
Samsung Galaxy S8 tipped to sport 2K sAMOLED display, 12MP Dual Pixel... Samsung Galaxy S8 tipped to sport 2K sAMOLED display, 12MP Dual Pixel camera and Iris scanner By - February 24, 2017 “The Galaxy S8 is expected to be unveiled on March 29th and go on sale on April 21st” 
Just yesterday, popular tipster Evan Blass aka @ evleaks posted the spec sheet of the Samsung Galaxy S8+ flagship. Now Technobuffalo has revealed the specs of the Samsung Galaxy S8 . In addition, a report out of Korea has revealed when the new Samsung flagships will be unveiled and will go on sale. 
As per Technobuffalo, the Samsung Galaxy S8 will sport either a 5.8-inch full rectangle Quad HD+ Super AMOLED display or a 5.6-inch 2K sAMOLED screen with rounded corners. The phone will come with a 12-megapixel Dual Pixel primary shooter and an 8-megapixel selfie snapper. It will offer dust and water-resistance thanks to IP68 certification, an Iris scanner, Samsung Knox, 4G LTE, 4GB of RAM, 64GB of expandable storage, wireless charging (charging pad sold separately) and earphones tuned by AKG. 
As for the release date leak, ETNews reports that Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S8 duo at an event in New York on March 29th, and start selling them in major markets on April 21st. The brand is expected to release a teaser for the new flagships at MWC next week.
